text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) khır pen phu prathan paccay yangchiph thima cak fak fa læa phændin kæ phwk than hrux khır pen ceakhxng kar diyin læa kar mxng læa khır pen phu hı mi chiwit hlangcak kar tay læa pen phu hı tay hlangcak mi chiwit ma læa khır pen phu brihar kickar læw phwk khea ca klaw kan wa xallxhˌ dangnan cng klaw theid (muhammad) phwk than mi yakerng hrux
